Hi,
 We are encountering the following problem -- when a redirection url in the form "/servlets/earjam.getHTML?id=redirect&URL=%2Fads%2Fgame%2FteaserSlide.html" a bug
"Permission Denied" occurs. The interesting point is that
when you put the complete url in the browser that error does not occur. Moreover, when we call that starting page slideshow (the whole thing are urls put in a JS array) by full DNS name (i.e. http://blah.blah.com/servlets...) no error occurs at all.
